name: New Skins Added
description: A wide selection of new character and weapon skins has been introduced, allowing players to further personalize their in-game appearance.

name: New Map: Sci-Fi Base
description: A futuristic map set in a high-tech base is now available, featuring new tactical opportunities and unique environmental hazards.

name: Weapon Balancing Update
description: Several weapons have been rebalanced to ensure fairer gameplay, based on player feedback and match statistics.

name: Matchmaking Improvements
description: The matchmaking system has been optimized for faster queue times and more balanced matches, improving the overall multiplayer experience.
